titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd in St. Martins Church in the suburbs of Canterbury, Sept. 14. 1669 at the funeral of the Right Honourable Mabella, Lady Fordwitch, the relict of Sir John Finch, Knight, Baron of Fordwitch, Lord Keeper of the Great Seal of England / by Peter Du Moulin ...
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
